00031 namespace Hypertable {
00032   using namespace Hyperspace;

00034   TableInfo::TableInfo(const String &table_name) {
00035     memset(&m_table, 0, sizeof(TableIdentifier));
00036     m_table.name = new char [strlen(table_name.c_str()) + 1];
00037     strcpy((char *)m_table.name, table_name.c_str());
00038   }
00039 
00040   int TableInfo::load(Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace_ptr) {
00041     String table_file = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + m_table.name;
00042     DynamicBuffer valbuf(0);
00043     int error;
00044     HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00045     uint64_t handle;
00046 
00047     if ((error = hyperspace_ptr->open(table_file.c_str(), OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback, &handle)) != Error::OK) {
00048       HT_ERRORF("Unable to open Hyperspace file '%s' (%s)", table_file.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00049       return error;
00050     }
00051 
00052     if ((error = hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "schema", valbuf)) != Error::OK) {
00053       HT_ERRORF("Problem getting 'schema' attribute for '%s' - %s", m_table.name, Error::get_text(error));
00054       return error;
00055     }
00056 
00057     Schema *schema = Schema::new_instance((const char *)valbuf.base, valbuf.fill(), true);
00058     if (!schema->is_valid()) {
00059       HT_ERRORF("Schema Parse Error: %s", schema->get_error_string());
00060       delete schema;
00061       return Error::RANGESERVER_SCHEMA_PARSE_ERROR;
00062     }
00063     m_schema_ptr = schema;
00064 
00065     m_table.generation = schema->get_generation();
00066 
00067     valbuf.clear();
00068     if ((error = hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "table_id", valbuf)) != Error::OK) {
00069       HT_ERRORF("Problem getting attribute 'table_id' from '%s' - %s", m_table.name, Error::get_text(error));
00070       return error;
00071     }
00072 
00073     if (valbuf.fill() != sizeof(int32_t)) {
00074       HT_ERRORF("%s/table_id contains a bad value", table_file.c_str());
00075       return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00076     }
00077 
00078     memcpy(&m_table.id, valbuf.base, sizeof(int32_t));
00079 
00080     hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00081 
00082     return Error::OK;
00083   }
00084 }
